description:
Guna UI is the suite for creating groundbreaking desktop app UI. It is for developers targeting the .NET Windows Forms platform. Guna UI guarantees faster development and improved productivity.

Requirements
Minimum System and User Requirements

Guna UI currently work with C# and VB.NET languages, specifically and specially designed for Windows Forms applications.

To effectively get the most out of our tools, your system needs to meet the following minimum requirements:
- Runs on Windows.
- Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 or higher.
- Visual Studio 2012 or later (recommended).

As a developer, you need to:
- Have a basic knowledge of C# or VB.NET.
- Have a basic knowledge of Windows Forms.
releaseNotes:
Note: Before updating Guna.UI, don't forget to backup your project!!

Control named Licensing changed to GunaUI_LicenseMgr.

New component: Guna2TaskBarProgress
- Allows you to display progress on the TaskBar

Guna2ControlBox:
- Fixed an issue with maximized borderless forms covering the taskbar.

Guna2DragControl:
- Fixed an issue with DockForm.
- Fixed an issue with DragForm.
- DockForm supports multi screen.
- DragForm supports multi drag (e.g Guna2DragControl1.SetDrag(panel1.Controls).

Guna2Elipse:
- Fixed problem with resizing control/form.

Guna2BorderlessForm:
- Added DragForm property (if false, drag is disabled).
- Fixed issue with form closing
- Fixed an issue with maximized borderless forms covering the taskbar.
- Fixed an issue with resizing control/form.
- Fixed an issue with DockForm.
- Fixed an issue with DragForm.
- DockForm supports multi screen.
- DragForm supports multi drag (e.g Guna2Borderless.SetDrag(panel1.Controls).

Guna2VScrollBar:
- Fixed an issue with the BindingContainer property property. 
- Supports binding to 'Panel'.
- Supports binding to 'FlowLayoutPanel'.
- Supports binding to 'UserControl'.
- Supports binding to 'ContainerControl'.
- Supports binding to 'TextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'RichTextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'DataGridView'.
- Supports binding to 'ListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'CheckedListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'TreeView'.
- Supports binding to 'ListView' (Note: .View = Details).

Guna2HScrollBar:
- Fixed an issue with the BindingContainer property property. 
- Supports binding to 'Panel'.
- Supports binding to 'FlowLayoutPanel'.
- Supports binding to 'UserControl'.
- Supports binding to 'ContainerControl'.
- Supports binding to 'TextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'RichTextBox'.
- Supports binding to 'DataGridView'.
- Supports binding to 'ListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'CheckedListBox'.
- Supports binding to 'TreeView'.
title: Guna.UI2.WinForms
